full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BLA MA MGON PO DBYER MED PA'I MGON DKAR YID BZHIN NOR BU LA GSOL 'DEBS DNGOS GRUB MYUR STZOL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(CES BLA MA DANG DBYER MED PA'I MGON DKAR YID BZHIN NOR BU LA GSOL BA 'DEBS PA DNGOS GRUB MYUR STZOL ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI BZHAD RDOR MING CAN GYIS SNGA SBYAR RNAMS SLAD 'DI LTAR BSGRIGS PA'I YI GE PA NI TSE DBANG DPAL GYIS BGYIS SO, ,)
